title: Dwarven Resilience
content:
Dwarven Resilience Effect You have Advantage on Saving Throws against poison, and you have Resistance against Poison damage. Requirements Dwarf, Duergar

Dwarven Resilience

You have Advantage on Saving Throws against poison, and you have Resistance against Poison damage.

Dwarven Resilience is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
